message.raw: Novatech DDSs can now use static mode too -- the two DDS outputs that don't support table mode. A new device class was made called StaticDDS, with methods to set phase, amp and freq. These should be instantiated as normal, as a child of the Novatech device, and with connection being set to 'channel 2' or 3.
